data.name: Mushmush Wizard Hat
data.description: A wizard hat decorated with rare mushrooms. Wears like a charm for fire and earth magic.

effects.description: Adds 10% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
